description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Avatar baseball is the original and funniest way to play baseball with your avatar.  Face CPU or a friend and make as much runs as possible. Prepare your fingers for the action.
description.short: Avatar baseball is the original and funniest way to play baseball with your avatar.  Face CPU or a friend and make as much runs as possible. Prepare your fingers for the action.
